amendment.description: Amendment designates the Central Texas Corridor as the future Interstate Route I-14.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to designate the Central Texas Corridor as the future Interstate Route I-14.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Babin to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Babin to the Rules amendment (A001).
